mapper.select: select MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_NAME, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_COUNTRY, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_TOTAL_COUNT, MOVIE_DIRECTOR, MOVIE_CONTENT, MOVIE_RUNNINGTIME, MOVIE_READCOUNT, MOVIE_POSTER_IMAGE, MOVIE_MAIN_IMAGE, MOVIE_GALLERY_IMAGE, MOVIE_GRADE, RNUM from (select MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_NAME, to_char(MOVIE_DATE,'yyyy') as MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_COUNTRY, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_TOTAL_COUNT, MOVIE_DIRECTOR, MOVIE_CONTENT, MOVIE_RUNNINGTIME, MOVIE_READCOUNT, MOVIE_POSTER_IMAGE, MOVIE_MAIN_IMAGE, MOVIE_GALLERY_IMAGE, MOVIE_GRADE, ROWNUM RNUM from (select * from MOVIE order by MOVIE_DATE desc) order by RNUM asc) where RNUM between 1 and 5
